komentar:
Quiet pods, hibernate, free from hassles apps 💯

Bobopod is a capsule hotel at the 4th floor of Ambassador Mall directly connected to the food court.

The bookings, payments and check in are all done by using the app. All is working well in just a few minutes 💯👍🏻✅ great job 🤝

The pods are half room cut horizontally, the earth type and sky type. There's no physical key, just QR codes from the app. The room has features controlled by a touch screen. You can change the light colours, add some relaxing music. Electric plugs 🔌 are by your side.

The sleep 💤😴 quality is very good 👍🏻.
Air conditioning is really cold 🥶❄️

They have three separate common seating area 🪑 with chairs, tables and electric plugs 🔌.

Pantry is provided with mugs, crockery, microwave, and kitchen sink.

Coffee ☕ is available from vending machine.

Bathrooms are separated by gender, there's enough showers rooms and seated toilets.

You need to keep your shoes in the show locker and use slippers inside the hotel.

There are five malls within walking distance: ITC Kuningan, Kuningan City, One Satrio, Lotte Mall and Bellagio.
hotel sangat bagus.kamarnya bersih.lestorannya nyaman dan segala masakan ada.lokazinya strategis...pokoknya mntappp

pelayanan ramah, mba nya baik. tapi kurang beruntung dapet kamar yang ga bisa dengerin musik, ntah rusak atau gimana. jo 17, bisa tolong diperbaiki, soalnya temenku kamar sebelah, itu bisa dengerin musik, ada suara pula. overall bagus, mantap pokonya
Rekomendasi sih ini dengan harga yang cukup terjangkau, akses menuju ke pusat kota jga enak. Pokonya okee

Nginep semalam disini karena Deket dengan kantor VSF buat urus visa Schengen, dan puas karena tempatnya dekat tinggal jalan kaki, untuk kamar bersih dan rapi, aku pakai yang double karena kalo singgle takut kesempitan, dan harganya juga terjangkau, kamar mandi diluar dan banyak juga bersih, ada tempat sholatnya juga dan bersih, sewa kamar include breakfast roti/sereal. Pelayanan juga ramah. Puas nginep disini yang backpaker an, ato lagi mo urus Visa. Dan juga sepatu kita dititipkan di loker, saat check ini kita akan diberikan akses untuk loker, penyimpanan sepatu, jadi masuk area kamar dengan sandal ruangan aja.
Lokasi strategis, kamar nyaman dan bersih. Di belakang area nya banyak yg jual makanan juga.

Sebenernya nginepnya udah dari januari lalu sih waktu ke jakarta karena mau nonton konser, hehe. Tp tiba-tiba keinget aja waktu nginep disini. Kamar nyaman, bersih, dan kebetulan juga udah beberapa kali kalo nginep pasti di bobobox. Toilet dan kamar mandi juga bersih, waktu itu pun juga dapet free sambun dari lif****. Dan disediain juga sarapan, roti dan ada teh yg bisa nyeduh sendiri. pelayanan juga ramah. Waktu itu aku lupa bawa hp pas ke mushola dan temenku malah udah masuk kamar duluan, akhirnya minta tolong kakaknya buat bukain pintunya karena ga bisa akses wkwk😭
Sayang sekali minus nya cuma di parkiran mobil ngga ada cctv, mobil saya di serempet mobil lain, bumper sampai pecah tidak ada pertanggung jawaban
Nginep disini pas takbiran, Lumayan nyaman nginep disini🫶🏻

Coba nginep disini 1 hari aja.. Saya dan keluarga dapat room agak dalam nomor 57.. Room oke ada ambient lampu yang bisa di setup, ada default lagu relaxing buat tidur, bisa connect bluetooth ke handphone kalau mau setel musik dari handphone.. kamar rapi bersih.. Toilet sharing bersih, cuma pas nginep ada bau pesing dan nemu tisu di dalam kloset wanitanya.. Kebersihan toilet kayaknya depends juga sama yang nginep orgnya jorok apa nggak.. Disini ada Quiet time di jam 21.00-07.00.. Tapi waktu nginep, jam 00.40an depan kamar setel lagu beat (lagu tembus ke kamar) dan bagian balik kamar tempat kita menginap (ruangan lain) ada cewe ngobrol ketawa2 dari jam 9 malam sampe jam 2 pagi ga berenti2 nembus bok ke kamar.. ga bisa tidur sama sekali.. untuk price ramah dikantong, buat sekadar nginep.. tapi kekedapan ruangan kurang.. Menurutku juga kamarnya ga terlalu dingin..
Overall nyaman, modern, tempat bersih, akses pakai barcode semua. Dapet di harga 110k masih worth it lah buat singgah (include 1x makan)
Bagus

This is my second stay in Bobobox, but my first time staying at this branch. It was located beside Mal Ambasador and it has a private entrance. It’s a bit hard to navigate, honestly, because the point on Google Maps is not necessarily accurate (it was in the lobby of ITC Kuningan. If you follow this, you need to go to the side lobby of ITC, cross the street to Mal Ambasador until you find a BCA office, then it is located just right around the corner of the office).

After the check-in, we were asked to change our shoes into their sandals (the only footwear allowed inside the pods area). The room was perfectly neat and comfortable. Although the Single room is not that suffocating (there’s more than enough room to move), I highly recommend it to stay at the Double room. You only need to pay an additional Rp50,000 per night, then you can have much more comfort! It’s worth it, trust me!

The bathroom and toilet are shared and located at the end of the hallways. It was well-maintained and every time I went there, it was always clean. They also provide free water refill (please bring your own water bottle) and free breakfast until 9 AM. I found no notable thing to complain about during my stay.

Compared to the services they provide, their price is CRAZY CHEAP! Another plus point is that this branch is located strategically in the middle of Kuningan. You can walk to Kuningan City, Lotte Mall Kuningan, etc.

Pro tip: Request a pod between the numbers 3-6 because these pods get sunlight during the day and have such an amazing view in night!

Rooms ☞ Clean, comfortable, quiet, spacious. Fantastic.

Staff ☞ Polite and friendly... although a bit racist towards "bule".

Its a beautiful little space to camp for a few days.

BUT toilets are DISGUSTING 🤢. They are clean. But they do not supply toilet slippers. So you have to walk/stand in everyone's piss. 💦🤢🤮. This is a massive hygiene issue. Did you learn nothing from COVID?

If you do stay here, bring some toilet slippers (secret).  especially for the showers. You know people often piss in the shower and other people spit! Do you really want to stand in that?

There is also a stupid QR code system. You can only open doors with QR code displayed on an app. That means everytime you go to toilet or take a SHOWER you have to take your phone with you.

This is just stupid. Obviously designed to scrape as much data about you as possible.

First time to sleep in a capsule hotel. First thing after checking in is go to your locker, store your shoe and get the sandal. The room is nice and clean I imagined how cramped it will be. But not at all. The ceiling for bed room around 1 meter. Plenty of headroom. The bed is only mattress, but wide. No spring whatsoever. It is firm. Comfy enough might be good for your back. AC control is like in air plane. Twist to shut or open. If you leave a bit of hole, the AC will whistle. Kinda anoying. Bath room and toilet is clean. No funky smell. Shower is pressurized. Water taste is good. Shower gel is super nice. Mild fragrance and don't make skin dry Towel is provided. Just bring your water bottle and tooth brush and paste. There are also pantry, coffee vending machine, instant foods, power bank rental, soft drinks you can buy. If you can survive sleeping in one person tent, thia hotel feels like an apartment.

This is my 3rd Bobobox experience and this place quite different because its located inside a shopping mall.

*Access:
The main enterance is inside the Ambassador Mall on 4th floor right beside the food court, and they got second enterance using direct elevator (and small ladders added) to walk right outside, its located near BCA ATM.

*Services:
- No outside shoes allowed inside the pod (capsule area), so we got slipper change
- No food or colored drink allowed to be eaten inside the pod, they offer eating area
- Free flow drink, bring your own tumblr will be your advantage, if you not as for paper cup by the reception
- Free amenities: toothbrush (by the reception), towel inside your pod, shared toilet and shower area, shampoo+soap available there
- Mushallah
- Mini pantry in reception area for washing dishes
- AC equipped in all area, so no smoking allowed inside, if you want to smoke you may go outside the building via elevator to smoke outside
- PODS with barcode system, need to install the apps to give you access keys AND ALWAYS BRING PHONE EVERYWHERE or you get locked out from your pod (from my experience hahaha)

*Suggestion:
- Door stopper on pods should be repaired or set to give smallest slam sound, helps the guest to sleep at night
- I'm very sensitive of odor kinda person, I realised the whole pods room smell with sweat. Wood can absorb some odors, so if laundry dropped for long time on it, or maybe wet feet after use bathroom, it will create the odor. Maybe use 'ampas kopi' as dehumidifier/sterilizer at some areas would help.

Anyway, would still drop by again to stay whenever I'm in town!

It was my first time staying in a bobobox, i was underestimated before because i had a bad experience staying in a capsule hotel previously.  Turns out, Bobobox amazes me!
Pros :
• strategic location near business districts
• worth the price to stay
• The pod's size is bigger than i thought, and it has technology to adjust the light ambience and relaxing sound.
• the frontline is really friendly ! The service is excellent.
• has a coffee machine to self order (it was cheap, around IDR 10,000, and tasted good).
• clean bathroom and toilet
• has private lift outside the mall building direct to bobobox so ppl does not have to enter thru mall.
• has a mushola !
• hot shower works well at any time.

Cons
• none
Lumayan seru nginep disini, tapi kamar mandinya perlu lebih dijaga kebersihannya, soalnya kadang gak bau dan saya lihat tidak ada wewangiannya. Para pengunjung harap bawa alat makan sendiri

Ruangan ok, servis ok, lokasi sebenarnya juga ok. Hanya kalau hujan pagi jam 7an, tidak ada transportasi online yang bisa dipanggil, jadi agak repot. Dan kalau hujan sore, daerah ini macetnya parah.
Suka pod nya karena tenang dan bersih.
Banyak pilihan makanan di mall.
Very strategic if you're on a business agenda (to central jakarta) or having fun in southern area
Good for business traveler,, clean enough,, location is strategic, facilities is remarkable, the convenience store around there only opened at 10am, but they do sell the ready to eat meal
Mantab

Sangat bersih dan tertata rapih, sangat mudah menemukan lokasi kuliner
The best pokoknya👌👌👌
Tempatnya bagus dapet pemandangan kotanya ,letaknya di pusat bisnis ,deket mall itc sama ambasador dan lotte avenue. Rekomen untuk yg mau transit aja atau healing ditengah2 sudirman.
Survey lewat gmaps, lokasi okee tp kayaknya susah transportasi umum ya? Paling murah di antara bobobox kebayoran dan pancoran.
Clean and comfort
Overall is good
AC ny dingin banget 😁 bersih, lokasi strategis, staff ramah. Akses bisa lewat mall ambassador atau bisa juga langsung lewat lift di belakang mall ambassador (24 jam) dekat BCA.
You can enter it via Ambassador Mall 2nd Floor, find the bobobox sign or entry via the bobobox elevator behind Ambassador Mall. Between ITC kuningan and Ambassador mall.

Baru pertama ke Bobobox ITC Kuningan. Check-in berjalan lancar lewat aplikasi. Semua cukup pakai qr code untuk masuk ke pintu-pintu.
Podnya tidak sepenuhnya kedap suara karena tetangga sebelah kamar yg orang India masih terdengar suaranya.

Minus: wifinya gak lancar
Hair dryer rusak

Kamar keren
Layanan sangat oke
Lokasi sangat strategis
Tempat sangat bersih
Suasana tenang
Teknologi yang digunakan canggih

Pertama buka dulu Internet speednya cepet banget, sekarang internet nya lancar cuma buat buka sosmed doang, selebihnya amsyong, even buat buka QR code di aplikasi Bobobox nya pun Lola 😅. Beberapa toilet "Under Maintenance" hampir 1 Minggu nginep masih under maintenance. Tapi, staff nya ramah ramah, informatif banget, yang bikin Amaze adalah mereka PASTI nyaranin affordable accomodation buat backpacker...

Beberapa kali nginep disini kalau WFO di kuningan. Surprisingly senyaman itu!

Pods nya selalu bersih, selalu bikin nyaman. Host jg ramah dan responsive kl di chat.

Plus nya disini adem/dingin banget, tp AC bs diatur (kipasnya diputer/tutup gitu di atas). Minusnya mungkin suara org buka/tutup pintu kadang ada yang ngegas, jd kedengeran dan ckup ganggu. Tp overall enak untuk stay. Keluar hotel, ada banyak makanan yang bisa di beli di foodcourt krn nyambung sama mall ambas.

Fasilitas bagus, bersih. Cuma apes dapet pod deket pintu masuk jadi berisik banget. Staf laundry juga berisik sekitar jam 2 pagi beberapa kali kebangun.

Awalnya agak pengap cuma lama-lama kebiasa dan perlahan-lahan ac jadi dingin.

Ada frozen food dan minuman berbayar. Air dispenser tersedia gratis.
Andalan hahah
strategis dan nyaman

Kamar kurang kedap suara. Selimut dan spreinya kurang bersih.

Kelebihan cuma dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan

Highly recommended!!! Bersih & nyaman banget. Ada meja & kursi di luar kamar buat makan/laptopan, jadi kamarnya bener2 buat tidur aja. Suka banget!

Fasilitas lengkap: sabun, shampo, sikat gigi, odol, handuk, gelas buat minum, dispenser.

Ada lift di luar mall yg khusus langsung ke Bobobox, jadi gak perlu khawatir kalo dateng kemaleman atau pergi kepagian pas masih gelap. Tanya aja ke satpam "ke Bobobox lewat mana?"

Note: Ini gak cocok buat orang yg pengen kamar luas lengkap dengan lemari, meja, kamar mandi dalam & TV.

Nyaman, pelayanan ramah , toilet beraih,  akses ke kantor deket terus lokasinya pas didalem itc kuningan lantai 4 bareng sama foodcourt jadi ga susah cari makan. Ditambah di dalem ada elevenia store sama makanan instan. Fasilitas juga ada air minum sama mini kitchen ad microwave sama air panas gratis. Terakhir ada jumpstart ngopi2 ga susah juga

Pertama kali nyoba hotel model pods. Sempet bingung mau ke lokasi karena ada di lt. 4 mall. Nanti naiknya gimana, kalo pulang malem gimana, kalo laper tengah malem pesen makannya gimana, bener-bener gak tau sama sekali. Pas nyampe lokasi, beuh enak banget. Kalo mau buka pintu, minimal harus buka pintu dan loker pake aplikasi. Mau pesen kopi langsung scan pake barcode. Ada snack bar di depan. Kamar? Keliatannya kecil, tapi nyaman parah. Minus AC aja yang susah banget dikecilin karena kulit saya tergolong tipis jadinya gampang kedinginan. Overall, kalo mau ke lokasi wisata bakal stay di bobobox. 👍
Not comfortable for honeymooners, room is very small, bathroom outside the room. This just transit hotel but not cheap, quite expensive for this type of hotel
Lumayan lah

Nyaman banget buat solo traveller kayak aku gini..
Ada 2 type kamar, sky dan earth.
Kalo sky konsep ranjang atas, dan earth ranjang bawah..
WiFi ok, bisa refill air mineral..
Walaupun konsepnya capsule, toilet nya tetep terpisah buat cewe dan cowo ..ada hairdryer, air panas/dingin, handuk, toiletris ny oke punya..
Oh ya, baru sampe dri st.jatinegara dinihari, langsung coba check in bisa dong (tergantung kamar ready)
Kalo checkin dinihari, bisa pakai aplikasi bobobox nya langsung ya, karena harus backdate tanggal nya..nanti bakal ada fo yang jelasin kok..bayar nya bisa mbanking, gopay juga.. disediain Frozen food jadi, ngga perlu keluar jauh buat makan..tinggal di angetin pakai microwave

Good facilities and services. Located near office area and has a lot of food stalls and restaurants around. But if there are a lot of people stay here, the wifi connection become horrible. I couldn't even connect to the wifi and even if I can, it runs so slow
resepsionis ramah. ada vending machine kopi juga. fasilitas lengkap dan itungannya cukup bersih. overall good bgt.
Kamar kurang kedap ya, malam seperti ada yang bersih2 terdengar dari dalam. Anyway kalo ngantuk banget ya tetap aja bs tidur.
Bersih tempatnya
Untuk tempaat strategis, jadi ga bingung-bingung mau nginep kmana
Ok bgt
Tolong lokasinya dibenahi, karna tdk sesuai titik
keren bobobox

Tempatmya bersih, deket ke mana2 pulang malem agk sepi tapi gak serem sih

Difficult access. You need to enter the mall.
Nice,  friendly staff,  affordable price. Suitable for you who wants to have a me-time

Pro (+)
- podnya bersih banget
- podnya luas, masih ada ruang buat gerak aktivitas, bukan cuma kasur doang
- kamar mandi biliknya banyak, luas, dan bersih banget
- shower room ada partisi buat shower sama nyimpen barang, jd baju & handuk ga akan basah
- air shower panas & kenceng
- udah diprovide sabun sampo & hairdryer
- communal area nyaman dan bersih banget
- selimut tebal
- ada free air galon, microwave, pemanas air, ada coffee maker juga (kopi beli mulai dari 6rb). Rasanya jg enak.

Cons (-)
- lokasi di lt.4 mall ambassador. Kalo pulang malem agak serem juga harus jalan lewat toko2 yang udah pada tutup. Ada lift direct yg dijaga satpam sih tp tetep harus ngelewatin toko2 tutup
- ga ada smoking area, harus keluar dari mall dulu
Titik google maps sudah dibenarkan dan sesuai tempatnya, sangat bersih dan nyaman untuk kapsul hotem, akan kembali lagi
Alamat ga jelas bgt... Titik di Google jauh bgt

I love this place. Even though this is a communal style accommodation, but it's always clean, comfortable and affordable. Especially the double bed pods. They even listen to our feedbacks on bathroom mats! Good location, literally inside a shopping mall, surrounded by food vendors.

Things to improve: a more proper parking area. And looking forward to the direct elevator access.
This is budget hostel with futuristic pods. Feels like in future. Its recommended for solo traveller for sure. Oh one thing, you shpuld doqnload bobobox app before check in.
It's good to stay there just please clean the woman toilet more
Recommended Capsule Hotel👍 …

Semua staff pada ramah, area pod bersih👍 …
best affordable hotel, prime location, amazing 👍👍👍👍 …

So far the most comfiest capsule hotel i've ever tried,the staff is really helpful,and also cleanliness was great
